author: Tyler Clifford
title: Everything Jim Cramer said on 'Mad Money,' including Fed influence, Costco's quarter
description: Jim Cramer gives a brief history of the stock market, talks Costco's quarter and Six Flags' rejected takeover bid for Cedar Fair, chats with RinggCentral CEO Vlad Shmunis and takes a look at what's at stake for trade talks later this week.
content: CNBC's Jim Cramer assures viewers that if the U.S. economy could rebound from the Great Depression of the 1930s and the Great Recession of the late 2000s that the country can get throw this apparent slowdown. The "Mad Money" host breaks down Costco's recent q… [+4950 chars]
